timeline.message: CB-8016 - OS upgrade on datalake API should throw bad request if datalake is not available

CB-8077 AWS RDS: enable CopyTagsToSnapshot

Tags of an RDS should be copied to the created snapshots.

CB-8078 RDS: BackupRetentionPeriod should be unified to 30 days

BackupRetentionPeriod is handled differently between AWS and azure, as well as between SDX and Distrox. All of them should have a meaningful value and set to 30 days for HA and a different value for non-HA scenarios.

CB-8057 adding a swagger placeholder

adding a swagger check placeholder to make is compatible in the jenkins job. this is just a placeholder

CB-8088 Schedule-Based downscaling integrated with Yarn Downscale recommendations

Schedule-Based Downscaling uses YARN downscaling recommendations to decide on which nodes to remove,
instead of removing a random set of nodes.

Merge pull request #8629 from hortonworks/swagger-placeholder-2.25.0

CB-8057 adding a swagger placeholder

timeline.author: pdarvasi

replies.bodyText: Nope. However, since someone is waiting for the merge and since this is a small change only, I would not correct it, but add a jira for that, if that is ok.
